title: Tdap shots
description: Find out more about Tdap vaccine coverage under Medicare Part D. Get info on preventative health, protect against tetanus, diphtheria, pertussis.
cleaned_text: Tdap shot. [Medicare prescription drug coverage (Part D)](/drug-coverage-part-d) usually covers all commercially available vaccines needed to prevent illness, including the Tdap shot. You can now get more vaccines under Part D at no cost to you. [Contact your Medicare drug plan](https://www.medicare.gov/plan-compare/) for more coverage information. What it is Tdap is the adolescent and adult booster shot for tetanus, diphtheria, and pertussis (also called whooping cough). The childhood shot is called DTaP. Both protect against tetanus, diphtheria, and pertussis.
